programme.title: The Filipino Channel Programming
programme.desc: Enjoy diverse and engaging shows from the Philippines. Experience heartwarming dramas, thrilling action, and captivating stories that celebrate Filipino culture.

programme.title: Cayetano in Action with Boy Abunda
programme.desc: Senator Alan Peter Cayetano and host Boy Abunda engage in insightful conversations on current events, social issues, and interviews with various guests. The show combines thought-provoking discussions with entertainment, offering diverse perspectives on important topics.

programme.title: Pinoy Crime Stories
programme.desc: The show tackled real-life crimes such as murder, trafficking, and abductions through interviews and dramatizations, offering insight into investigations.

programme.title: Brigada
programme.desc: An award-winning investigative documentary program hosted by multi-awarded broadcast journalist Kara David.

programme.title: Agripreneur
programme.desc: Features the local agriculture industry from practical tips on animal raising and planting to stories of entrepreneurs behind the country's most profitable farms and agricultural spaces.

programme.desc: A program that rounds up the trending feel-good stories in the Philippines and offers fashion tips and affordable healthy recipes for Kapuso viewers on a budget.

programme.desc: Features a different full-length, cinéma vérité style documentary that often tackles social issues such as poverty and corruption.

The Last Woman Standing ep 9
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa ep 48
programme.desc:
This is a story of revenge by Norman Dela Cruz, a 
loving son, and he aspires to become a lawyer for 
the underprivileged. After his mother was killed, he 
vowed to seek revenge against the influential 
retired judge, Benito Balmores.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 19
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 2
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Brush ep 13
programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother’s unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 9
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 1
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 1
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 3
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 12
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 2
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: For the Love ep 12
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Irene is torn between her selfish and immature husband and her considerate neighbour. She is forced to choose between the two when her son, tired of the constant fighting, runs away from home.

programme.desc:
‘Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 1
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 12
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: For the Love ep 12
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 10
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Irene is torn between her selfish and immature husband and her considerate neighbour. She is forced to choose between the two when her son, tired of the constant fighting, runs away from home.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 3
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Biyudo Si Daddy, Biyuda Si Mommy

It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: GMA Ganito Tayo, Kapuso!
programme.desc: As part of GMA's 75th Anniversary celebration, the Kapuso Network presents 7 captivating short films, featuring 7 core values promoting our identity as a nation. Each powerful story is brought to life by Sparkle's brightest stars, honoring GMA's heartwarming legacy across generations of Filipinos.

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.desc: A public service program aimed at giving a voice to the public's grievances and complaints, exposing wrongdoing, and providing concrete resolutions.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.
